about_the_game:
Project Yo-Yo delivers an exhilarating arcade experience, thrusting you into a frenetic arena FPS where every move counts. Master the art of repurposing your lines of fire on the fly amidst a relentless bullet hell to ascend the ranks and dominate the brutal leaderboard.

Gameplay Features:

  • Engage in dynamic Shoot, and Recall mechanics with your YoYo.
  • Charge up your YoYo's damage by striking more enemies.
  • Splash your flying YoYo to Push enemies to your advantage.
  • Utilize precise recalls to repurpose your lines of fire and turn the tide of battle.
  • Unleash Ultimate YoYos to flood the arena and seize control in bullet time.
  • Rise through the ranks and establish your dominance on the Global Leaderboard.
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game


Project Yo-Yo delivers an exhilarating arcade experience, thrusting you into a frenetic arena FPS where every move counts. Master the art of repurposing your lines of fire on the fly amidst a relentless bullet hell to ascend the ranks and dominate the brutal leaderboard.

Gameplay Features:

  • Engage in dynamic Shoot, and Recall mechanics with your YoYo.
  • Charge up your YoYo's damage by striking more enemies.
  • Splash your flying YoYo to Push enemies to your advantage.
  • Utilize precise recalls to repurpose your lines of fire and turn the tide of battle.
  • Unleash Ultimate YoYos to flood the arena and seize control in bullet time.
  • Rise through the ranks and establish your dominance on the Global Leaderboard.
name: Project Yo-Yo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo equivalent or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
